text: This husk can cast grand spell like its true form is
Gained by reaching 30 level with the Husk
The necromancer king's reign of terror has come to an end, his dark magic shattered and his undead armies turned to dust.
The mistress of vampires has been vanquished, her centuries-long scheming and manipulation finally brought to an end
The fearsome champion of the undead legions has fallen, his ancient sword shattered and his cursed soul banished to the void beyond.
